author: mbenson
msg: always generate source jar before having shade generate/update one; upgrade shade to 1.6 with note RE 1.7

author: mbenson
msg: don't refer to 'target' dir explicitly; some plugins (e.g. shade) may become confused and seemingly append 'target' to 'target' (probably project.build.directory) since 'target' is relative.  Use project.build.directory property and be nice and portable.
